Edges-Combat -- Male Avion Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d8
Battle: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3 Survival: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Research: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Keen Senses: +1 Notice step
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Feint: Force foe to oppose Fighting test with Smarts instead of Agility
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Free Runner: +2 Athletics (climbing)/+2 on foot chases
Killer Instinct: May reroll self-initiated opposed Test
Size: 0
Advances: 9 Improvement Points: 22 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 10; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (5 points): Block; Brawler; Bruiser; Calculating; Combat Reflexes; Counterattack; Dead Shot; Dodge; Double Tap; Extraction; Feint; First Strike; Free Runner; Frenzy; Giant Killer; Hard To Kill; Harder To Kill; Improved Block; Improved Counterattack; Improved Dodge; Improved Extraction; Improved First Strike; Improved Frenzy; Improved Level Headed; Improved Nerves Of Steel; Improved Rapid Fire; Improved Sweep; Improved Trademark Weapon (Long Bow); Improvisational Fighter; Iron Jaw; Killer Instinct; Level Headed; Marksman; Martial Artist; Martial Warrior; Mighty Blow; Nerves Of Steel; No Mercy; Rapid Fire; Rock And Roll; Steady Hands; Sweep; Trademark Weapon (Long Bow); Two-Fisted; Two-Gun Kid Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses; Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 11 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (3) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Bronze Corselet Shield: Ballistic Shield Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Gatling (2d8 R24" AP 2); Long Bow (+2 2d6 R15" AP 1); Unarmed (+2 d8+d10)
Combat Notes:
Block: +2 Parry/-2 foe Gang Up bonus
Brawler: +2 Toughness/+2 Unarmed damage step
Bruiser: Increased Brawler effects
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Frail: -1 Toughness
Improved Block: Increased Block effects
Improved Counterattack: Increased Counterattack effects
Improved Extraction: Increased Extraction effects
Improved First Strike: Increased First Strike effects
Improved Frenzy: Increased Frenzy effects
Improved Level Headed: Increased Level Headed effects
Improved Nerves Of Steel: Increased Nerves Of Steel effects
Improved Rapid Fire: Increased Rapid Fire effects
Improved Sweep: Increased Sweep effects
Improved Trademark Weapon (Long Bow): Increased Trademark Weapon effects
Martial Artist: +2 Unarmed attack/+2 Unarmed damage step
Martial Warrior: Increased Martial Artist effects
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Trademark Weapon (Long Bow): +2 attack and Parry with Long Bow
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Calculating: Ignores 2 points of penalties on 1 action when Action Card is 5 or less
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Combat Reflexes: +2 on Shaken and Stunned recovery rolls
Counterattack: Free attack after failed foe attack 3/rd
Dead Shot: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage from first successful ranged attack
Dodge: -2 foe ranged attacks
Double Tap: +1 firearm attack and damage
Extraction: Negate attack of 3 foes when withdrawing
First Strike: Free attack when foe moves into reach 3/rd
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Free Runner: Move full Pace on difficult ground
Frenzy: Extra Fighting die on 2 attacks/rd
Giant Killer: +1d6 damage vs. foes of size 3 or greater
Hard To Kill: Ignores Wound penalties on Vigor tests to avoid bleeding out
Harder To Kill: 50% chance to cheat death
Improved Dodge: +2 evading area attacks
Improvisational Fighter: No penalty w/improvised weapons
Iron Jaw: +2 Soak rolls/+2 Vigor vs. knockout
Level Headed: Choose best of 3 Action Cards
Marksman: May forego move for +1 ranged attack or to ignore 2 ranged attack penalties
Mighty Blow: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage on first successful melee attack
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 2 points of Wound penalties
No Mercy: +2 on Benny damage reroll
Rapid Fire: Increase ROF by 1 2/rd
Rock And Roll: May trade move for ignoring recoil
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform; reduces running shot penalty by 1
Sweep: May make attack on all within reach
Two-Fisted: No multi-action penalty for melee attack with each hand
Two-Gun Kid: No multi-action penalty for ranged attack with each hand
Notes
Validation Errors:
Edge Allocation: 5 available vs. 45 allocated
Improved First Strike Edge: Requires advances (currently 9) >= 12 and first strike feature (currently 1)
